mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(review_no, review_rating, review_content, review_writer, user_id, review_date) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{reviewRating}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewWriter}, #{userId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM review WHERE user_id=#{loginedId} ORDER BY review_no DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM review WHERE review_writer=#{loginedId} ORDER BY review_no DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE user_id=#{loginedId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE review_writer=#{loginedId}
